website_summaries.verdict: The Skullcandy PLYR 2 is a relatively inexpensive, lightweight gaming headset that lets you cut the cord for $130.
pros: Inexpensive for a wireless gaming headset
cons: Volume/balance knob is small and fiddly

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless headphones but be careful if you're using them for phone calls
customer_reviews.text: Great sound clarity and work well for telemarketing or call center. Comfortable to wear. If multiple people have a similar style, they will sometimes pick up other people's phone calls, so be careful of that if you are using them in that type of environment. Also, the range is erratic--sometimes you can go quite a bit further than it says but sometimes they cut out unexpectedly. Also, you don't get a warning when you're going to lose the signal--it just drops out--so if you're in the middle of a call and you go too far, you'll just lose the call.
customer_reviews.author: Philly5705

customer_reviews.title: Delivers what's advertised. Can't just use the headphones on the bus though.
customer_reviews.text: A little flimsy but very reliable. Very nice sound and a great fit for my head. I did have to loosen the grip a little but that was very easy and done in a day. The most annoying thing is actually listening to the sound, however. It is very difficult to listen on a wired connection. Actually, it's impossible. This set of headphones is entirely wireless and requires its wireless transmitter block. It does have a very good range, however, it is best used on desktops and for other immobile stations. You can't just take these to listen to your phone on the bus. Has very good range though and delivers what is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Sound is excellent. Range is really good. I've walked clear across the office before the sound starts to cut out (probably 30+ feet, through a few walls). The charge lasts multiple hours (though I've never run it down). Sound quality is great for both voice (Lync calls) and music (especially with the 3 quick EQ settings). Haven't tested fully with the PS3, but limited testing seems to be easy and great. Flip up mic muting is awesome, frankly. I don't have to remember to manually mute my line.
customer_reviews.author: browner

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst headset I have ever bought from skullcandy. I have had alot of their products but this is by far the rose one. Made from weakest plastic broke literally 3 months after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: teddy koo

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product, however cheaply made. They should be more around the $20-$40 price range in my opinion. This is my second set, the first were PLYR1's. I never had any problems with the first set and sold them months after I got them. Bought these to play online more with party chat and cortana voice commands. The ear piece was broke off right out of the box, a little snap back together and they have been just fine so far. Just know there is a high chance they will be broken at least once within the first 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jarhead

customer_reviews.title: nice headset especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to used with my xbox 360 and they worked well enough but I was plesantly suprised when I plugged them into my computer for skype and team speak! Make it very easy to hear and cancel outside noise well. My only small complaint is that occasionally they take a long time to connect or disconnect from the computer. However I am not sure that this is not my computer itself. They work well for phone, xbox 360 and pc so far and the battery life is quite good.
customer_reviews.author: Adam J. Castiglione

customer_reviews.title: Skull Candy is great about replacing them under warrantee
customer_reviews.text: On my 3rd Headset Since October. the 3 tiny screws above the ear Piece keep breaking out. leaving the Earpiece detached from the headset. Skull Candy is great about replacing them under warrantee. but I think that only lasts till October. I'm a 48 year old. I use the Headset to communicate over VOIP for work. No Game playing for me. I love the headset it works great. Just wish it wasn't so fragile. Update: sending them in again.
customer_reviews.author: Darin W Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality but if you plan on putting them ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of these headphones and they broke while I was putting them on! I got them replaced and have tried to be extremely gentle with the new set, but I have already experienced a smaller break in the SAME SPOT. They feel extremely brittle and bonus, they won't work with iTunes videos, I can't get the issue fixed after talking to even after working with Skullcandy and itunes on the issue. I plan on returning these. Great sound quality but if you plan on putting them on and taking them off at all, I'd recommend a set of turtle beach instead,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was super awesome for 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: Love this headset for the audio quality and the feel. I also think they look rather cool. The only reason I'm giving them a 3 star is after 4-5 months the orange extension piece on the right side of the headset snapped. I'd like to say I dropped it during rigorous Pilates or did something crazy to it but I literally was just putting them on my fat head getting ready for a gaming session. I would think that these would be universally shaped but may be for those of a more modest cranium.
customer_reviews.author: kyle dotson

customer_reviews.title: So sad! I bought two pairs of these and both ...
customer_reviews.text: So sad! I bought two pairs of these and both broke in the same spot as the other reviewers have pictured. (Those dumb little plastic screws!) I would have worn these forever because they were so light weight, comfy, the range was amazing and the battery life was fantastic. The first pair broke in about a month, second pair in less than a week. I give up.
customer_reviews.author: R.C.

customer_reviews.title: Not Surround Sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking "a surround sound cordless headset this cheap". While still inexpensive, not surround sound. The stereo sound is great. Good bass. Blocks out the noise around me. Starts to hurt my ears after about an hour (I might just have big ears). I enjoyed them, so I kept them. Only have one wire going to my Xbox controller. I also chose it because it can work on anything with RCA outlets and a USB port. So if I decide to use it with my computer, I can.
customer_reviews.author: mdloyd

customer_reviews.title: Not made too good
customer_reviews.text: Overall the sound quality was pretty good, in the headset was comfortable to wear. However within a week we can a half the through the frame broke into when I was taking them off my head. So because of the sound quality I’ll give it one star, but as far as durability and quality of the actual device, it was poorly made and a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: jjon meiggs

customer_reviews.title: Trassssh
customer_reviews.text: Okay the function of the headphones are amazing but I feel they are cheap quality in the plastic. I got one pair and the day I got them I knocked them of my desk (very lightly) and they snapped. I was really sad but I ordered another pair. And not but 2 months later it was trying to put them on my head and they snapped exactly the same. I only stretched them to get them on my head like normal. They are just really crap
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones! I had to replace my Turtle Beaches (got destroyed during a move) and I was looking for something inexpensive that way wireless. It does have a cord that hooks to my xbox controller so I can talk when in game-play but other then that, it is pretty wireless. The sound quality is great and the way they fit my ears is even better. The quality of the material is great! I love that they are rechargeable. I still have trouble figuring out the sound controls but I am still working on that.
customer_reviews.author: bnmolineux

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: this works great for PUBG, can hear opponents coming from any direction clearly and still hear what is going on around me in the house
customer_reviews.author: terry carr

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, poor material quality
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good, battery life is ok, actual ear piece broke after about a month. I use them daily at work for wireless headphones to listen. Battery lasts 6 hours max after overnight charging
customer_reviews.author: Hayden Compton

customer_reviews.title: Gift purchase
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is he was excited to get his gift. I did good.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials for a $120 paperweight
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality and comfort of the headset were great, but unfortunately it was manufactured with cheap, thin plastic parts and broke in less than a week. Don't buy this headset.
customer_reviews.author: Louis E Troutman II

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Really love these headphones. I've been using them for a couple months now no problem. Use them for PC gaming online and haven't had any problems. Good sounds quality. Colors are great too.
customer_reviews.author: Karlie

customer_reviews.title: Good apart from some build-quality concerns
customer_reviews.text: The good: Sound quality, ease of use, battery life. All very happy. The bad: Within nine months of owning it both earphones had, at separate times, broken off (one after about two months, the other after about eight). The plastic around the screws holding them together seems to snap. I used superglue to fix this, and it seems to be staying together for now, but I'm not confident about the overall lifespan of this headset.
customer_reviews.author: David L

customer_reviews.title: Mic is useless for X-box one
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is excellent on these headphones and that's the only thing I'm happy with. The box states these are compatible with the X-box one. You have to buy an adapter, which I was expecting. However, that's only for the sound to work and only in stereo, not surround sound. And not the microphone. The mic does not work in any capacity with the X-box one. This is not stated anywhere on the box or in the included literature. Unless you're using these solely for your PC, don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Crounk

customer_reviews.title: They work awesome for her while she's playing online games
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife for her birthday. She loves it. She walks all around our house with them on, upstairs and down, and never has issues with them cutting in or out. They work awesome for her while she's playing online games.
customer_reviews.author: Dameon

customer_reviews.title: Happy :)
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this headset! The sound quality is awesome, and the volume can be adjusted. People are never complaining that they can't hear me or that I'm cutting out. In fact, at first, it took me a bit to get used to not yelling into the mic anymore. I was worried that the ear parts might make my ears hurt/sore, but they don't (even after hours of wearing them) because they are nice and soft and cushioned! The headset is easily muted by pushing the mic in the upright position. Super easy to use, cool color, all around great buy and worth the money spent. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: We enjoyed it while it worked
customer_reviews.text: We enjoyed it while it worked, but the microphone went out after about 11 months of use. I'm still giving it 5 stars because, even though it was a used-like-new purchase, Skullcandy is replacing it at 50% off retail (about what I originally paid). I consider that excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: J. HOFFMAN

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality, but wireless still has its issues.
customer_reviews.text: Good: The equipment is sturdy and the sound quality is high. I appreciate the general construction on the headset, and it's pretty comfortable around the ear and sits well on the head. Bad: The headphones do not stay connected with the wireless broadcast system very well. This results in the sound diminishing and nearly disappearing from time to time through a game, movie, or conversation and is followed by a quick re-connection to the device and the sound comes back all of a sudden. It's difficult to follow conversations, movies, music, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Stallworth

customer_reviews.title: I LIKE THESE - BUT THEY ARE A LITTLE BRITTLE - ...
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE THESE - BUT THEY ARE A LITTLE BRITTLE - IF YER A GAMER, AND YOU GET SCREWED BY THE GAME YOU PLAY, DON'T TAKE THEM OFF IN DISGUST AND PARK THEM BY THE KEYBOARD WITH A HARD LANDING. THE SLIGHTEST AMOUNT OF IMPACT SEEMS TO ALWAYS DAMAGE SOMETHING ........... OTHER THAN THAT? 5 STARS
customer_reviews.author: D. Buck

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect around the ears.
customer_reviews.text: The perfect fit for earphones and microphone. Works well with conference calls as well as with online gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Annelize Greeff

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend. It's built very poorly and the plastic holding my left earcup broke after exactly 20 days. Over the course of 3 months that I had it, the volume balance has reversed itself, and drops randomly (if its too low) unless I'm using more than one audio source. The mic is too low and is barely picked up by any program I use, even at 100%. There are better headsets that are worth the price. It's also a hassle to set up if you plan on recording with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence L.

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless headset I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is wonderful, the battery life is excellent, they fit snugly, and they cancel out background noise well. The stylish design is a huge plus as well. Truly the best wireless headset I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: like, 5-8 hours long
customer_reviews.text: head it for about 1 month now and i prefer it over all the headphones i have from razer. The sound quality is phenomenal for its price range. The ear cuffs are a bit small and can become uncomfortable for long periods of game time, like, 5-8 hours long, but i believe sound quality is its selling point.
customer_reviews.author: David Perez

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully
customer_reviews.text: Headset works great! There is a PS4 firmware update on reddit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't stretch headband
customer_reviews.text: Had the headphones for literally a month and when I put them on one day the left ear cup broke off the headphones. So when I claimed the warranty from Skullcandy (which I love) they didn't have any in stock anymore so now I don't have any gaming headphone
customer_reviews.author: Alex J.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and really nice looking but after one week of owning I was placing on my head gently and the side broke like everyone else. I am giving 3 stars because even though they broke seller was very nice and helpful. Thank you Guttovilles.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Conway

customer_reviews.title: One Star DONT BUY IT BROKE THE DAY AFTER THE RETURN DATE EXPERATION!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This sh*t broke when I took it off my head wtf
customer_reviews.author: Justin Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Son loves
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted these so bad - he loves them
customer_reviews.author: Colleen M. Drajem

customer_reviews.title: Defective product lasted less than two weeks
customer_reviews.text: Product is very easy to set up. However, within two weeks it completely failed. Headset would not power on would not accept a charge.
customer_reviews.author: L. Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Loose microphone
customer_reviews.text: The microphone is very loose so it keeps falling down to your neck and there’s no way to tighten it up.
customer_reviews.author: terrir

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Headphones.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing. The sound quality is great and there is no audio lag. The only drawback is it requiring a usb connection for the transmitter. The ear pads don't block out ambient noise and they don't really keep the sound in so it can be heard by others around you clearly. However, they are extremely comfortable, and the three preset equalizer settings cover all the best settings for different games and music. The range of the bluetooth is fairly long and there is no loss in quality behind various doors and through walls. Overall an awesome set of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Baeza

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I use these headphones everyday for work. The sound is fantastic! They are comfortable to wear for an extended time. The distance range is nice, too. I can go anywhere in my house and not lose reception. I can work for 12 hours on a single charge. I've never had the battery die. I would absolutely recommend these to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: HKV1812

customer_reviews.title: Cheap device, amazon at least gave me a full refund.
customer_reviews.text: Mic didn't work at all. The device is cheaply made. The sound is actually pretty good from the headset. If the mic worked it would be closer to 4 stars only because of the cheap price. Amazon did however make it right and gave me a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Impressive.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic audio, great range, some installation difficulties. Remember on PC to use the USB for power, not on the PC but in a power plug. works great with Windows 8 Xbox Music subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond H Dugan

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good - Mono audio only on PC w/o extra cable
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent headset, but beware... it's mono only without using a 3.5mm auxiliary cable from your PC's sound card / headphone jack. For the money, you'd think it would be a fully-functional USB audio device.. Oh yeah, and it doesn't come with the cable.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound
customer_reviews.text: I plugged in my new PLYR 2 headset and it worked right away, even in Linux. The sound quality is amazing and I love the bass settings. Being able to use USB for sound or the 3.5mm jack is really nice. The wireless range is a LOT farther then 10m, closer to 50m. Great headset, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: These look great, they sound great, the battery last a good solid amount of time, easy to charge, easy to use. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skully Fans
customer_reviews.text: This only applies if ur a skullcandy fan, but these headsets are great right out the box, all the pin-point sounds that you'd expect, great range for the wireless part (about 15-20feet for me) but takes some time to get used to going up & down to chat on the mic but after ther sweet to have, battery life could be alil better for long use but for casual users ther perfect, overall ther worth getting if not realy worth trying out just yolo it, GG
customer_reviews.author: Javi

customer_reviews.title: Mono audio only. No stereo audio.
customer_reviews.text: Headphones are MONO audio only. So false advertising on that whole "clear stereo sound". Do yourself a favor and just spend an extra 40$ on good headphones.
customer_reviews.author: delta

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I got them for my Husband and he LOVES THEM great battery life. However the mic is alittle weak and the volume will rest every time you restart the system. Other than that my husband loves them well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Aprill Burson

customer_reviews.title: Right side comes apart
customer_reviews.text: Right side snap I know 3 other people have the same head set once you super glue it together its like new great for call center job as a supervisor
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 1 hour
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this is my 2nd set of Skullcandy headphones being returned for either not working or having a bad description. I would steer clear of all Skullcandy headphones from Amazon until the problem can be identified and fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Marky Nark

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd pair the 1st ones broke the first month but the seller was awesome he replaced very quick. This pair has held up great
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality, poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my second PLYR headset from Skullcandy, and like most of their products the sound quality is very good, clear and loud with impressive bass. HOWEVER both of the headsets I had (PLYR1 and PLYR2) both suffer from inferior build quality. I had both headsets brake in the same place, right where the earpiece mounts to the frame, if they used a metal bracket instead of plastic it would not have this problem, and for $100(PLYR2) and $200 (PLYR1) I expect better build quality.
customer_reviews.author: John Knox

customer_reviews.title: These things broke 15 days after I got them
customer_reviews.text: These things broke 15 days after I got them. They had good sound quality but these skullcandy headphones are known for breaking. Wouldn't recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Difficult controls.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last year as I had bought a second 360 during Black Friday. Great sound quality, but the controls for adjusting voice chat and game volume can be a bit cumbersome. Using it now with XB1 along with the chat adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Tim H.

customer_reviews.title: The sound is great but the mic barely picks up my voice
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great but the mic barely picks up my voice, it took hours of monkeying with settings for people to be able to even hear me.
customer_reviews.author: Gilgamesh

customer_reviews.title: Best headset I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: It came exactly how I thought it would and the package looked phenomenal. Everything works perfectly and beyond my expectations in addition my PS3 was able to connect the headset within a minute or less.
customer_reviews.author: classyjohn

customer_reviews.title: BEST SOUND ON A WIRELESS HEADSET
customer_reviews.text: BOOM !!! BEST SOUND ON A WIRELESS HEADSET. BATTERY LIFE KIND OF SHORT.
customer_reviews.author: Aureliano BuenDia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gaming experience
customer_reviews.text: These were for my 10 year old. He loves them. I told him I was writing a review, so to tell me what he thought of them, and he said that gaming was a "beautiful experience". Haha. So I guess that's a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Shopmommy24

customer_reviews.title: Good Headset.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my girlfriend and she loved them, they fit her perfectly, and she loved the color too. However, if you are going to play Xbox 360 through HDMI, you will need the RCA Optical Audio Adapter Cable. Overall this was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelby Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Advertised as Xbox one compatible, even with the stereo ...
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as Xbox one compatible, even with the stereo adapter for the controller the wireless transmitter had no compatible connection to the x-box. This unit needs a digital audio input to work with the Xbox one. I am returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Eric.Forbis

customer_reviews.title: What a waste. Never again will I purchase a skull
customer_reviews.text: Barely had it for over a month, and the flimsy plastic part holding the ear cups to the plastic frame has snapped clean off. Don't even buy this at 99% discount. What a waste. Never again will I purchase a skull candy
customer_reviews.author: Kalyan Rai

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is fantastic - great bass and responsive - and the fact ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is fantastic - great bass and responsive - and the fact that it does it all wirelessly is amazing. I returned a pair of photive ones for this and am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: abelianQCD

customer_reviews.title: Good product only one of the chords needed to hook ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipment. Good product only one of the chords needed to hook up to the PS3 had to be purchased separately.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey H.

customer_reviews.title: Really like it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this headset. It's a little heavy but since it's wireless that is to be expected. It has nice coloring and sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for xbox one
customer_reviews.text: This headset does not work for xbox one. Do not buy it if in xbox. Very unhappy
customer_reviews.author: Donovan Edmonds

customer_reviews.title: Nice gaming headphones, really snug fit on a normal adult size head
customer_reviews.text: Like most the reviews, works great but a slightly uncomfortable snug fit. My kids love it and it fits great on them.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L. Milan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Of all the headsets I've used in my online gaming career, this by far is the most comfortable! I did a lot of research, a lot of the $200-$300 headsets that I checked out that claimed to have Ultra Awesome sound looked like thee most uncomfy headsets ever. The battery life is great! The one thing I have trouble with are the volume controls when I play certain games on my PlayStation3.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Raadgep

customer_reviews.title: These headphones have amazing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have amazing sound quality!! I am really surprised that they have similar sound quality comparing from my Audio-Technica studiophones. Make sure you have or buy an AUX cable, because it does not come with one in the box. If you do not pair an Aux cable with these headphones the sound quality will drastically diminish. <<<<<<<<
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cook

customer_reviews.title: very excellent sound.
customer_reviews.text: the volume control is a little confusing but it gives nice sound for gaming. and they have lots of rumbling bass.
customer_reviews.author: Marc A. Persaud

customer_reviews.title: This headset is awesome and delivers great in game sound
customer_reviews.text: This headset is awesome and delivers great in game sound. I do think that the gear feels a bit flimsy, but I have not had any issues in the few months I have owned it.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: ... the money you cant go wrong one of the best headset i have
customer_reviews.text: for the money you cant go wrong one of the best headset i have had
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We had to purchase new headset, my daughter had this for a year and the mic got loose. Purchased turtle beach.... great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Good sound not-so-good fit
customer_reviews.text: Overall very good sound quality. My only issue is the ear pieces are a little too tight on my ears and cause some discomfort after wearing them for an extended period of time, unlike my previous (wired) Skullcandy headphones.
customer_reviews.author: E. Heikkila

customer_reviews.title: I hate these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Friends have a tough time hearing me when we are in video chat. I hate these headphones. I wish I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skull Candy Headphones
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the headphones. I love the rechargeable feature. She had a set of turtle beach wired headphones before and she says that these sound better. Unfortunately I havent tried them yet, but I will soon.
customer_reviews.author: Sjacobs

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: They work great! The sound is good. The plastic is a little weak one ear broke but was easily fixed with super glue. They have a good range!
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: They work great...with an addendum.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones sound really good and I use them on my work PC for taking phone calls and they work great. My only complaints is when I connect the headphone cable to my iPhone or iPad I do not get any audio. Also, if you play a song that starts out quiet and the audio level rises it does not play sound until it reaches a threshold. Both of these are after replacing the headphones through amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Smith

customer_reviews.title: Return process was not to painful but having to pay for shipping is not acceptable
customer_reviews.text: Audio performed as expected. As other reviewers have noted, the earphone cup broke loose from the headband. Return process was not to painful but having to pay for shipping is not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: Very fragile
customer_reviews.text: It broke in 3 weeks of usage. Really weak. I work in a call center and almost everyone that has a pair has had it break
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best gaming headset I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best gaming headset I have ever used. No batteries, it just charges, you can charge while you play. It covers everything I've wanted in a gaming headset
customer_reviews.author: Claire Gretz

customer_reviews.title: What can I say? Solid all around. Does ...
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? Solid all around. Does no wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Rudnicki

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made, Easily Breaks.
customer_reviews.text: This headset sounded amazing until it broke. The earcups are connected to the headband via screws that are screwed in plastic. With that being said it snapped far too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Duke

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, not very good controls
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for 2 weeks, the sound is great. It is a little hard to get adjusted right while on your head. the control has no index point that you can feel so if it is not on just right it is easy to do something you didn't mean too. A little glitchy, power cycling usualy fixes this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wireless works amazing.. small ear hole.
customer_reviews.text: For people with small ears... It worked through-out my whole house. ended up giving it to my girl friend.
customer_reviews.author: Triforcetech

customer_reviews.title: Good, but...
customer_reviews.text: When this headset works, it works great. At first, it was just when using the ps3, but now its on xbox too. Battery life is good, fit is comfortable, great sound (otherwise).
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: False advertising and bad mic.
customer_reviews.text: Description said they were surround sound but were only stereo. Turns out the plyr 1 are surround sound. Not the plyr2 but they did sound awesome enough that I liked them but the mic wasnt in working condition.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Vega

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for online gaming. Comfortable and very good sound. I recommend this to anyone. Skullcandy you did it again.

customer_reviews.text: Love most everything about them but the range... forget going more than 25feet or so

customer_reviews.text: Broke immediately when put on head. The red bridge for the ear piece and the ring is super fragile.

customer_reviews.text: great headset was using a 200$ headset and these are just as good and man do they have some bass to them. Not to mention how fast it got to my house, thanks for everything you'll always have my business

customer_reviews.title: The audio will not work if you have a smart tv. Since the PS4 only uses a HDMI ...
customer_reviews.text: It lied about its compatibility with the PS4. The audio will not work if you have a smart tv. Since the PS4 only uses a HDMI cable.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Everett

customer_reviews.title: Love the way they feel on the head especially since ...
customer_reviews.text: Came sooner than expected. Love the way they feel on the head especially since the ear cups are soft and supple. The sound quality is amazing and I am super pleased with the purchase.

product_meta.title: Skullcandy PLYR2 Surround Sound Wireless Gaming Headset, Teal/Navy (SMPLFY-280)
product_meta.description: Color:TealThe game has changed with the wireless PLYR2 gaming headset. Expertly tuned with three audio profiles, PLYR2 delivers style, comfort and Supreme Sound technology for an immersive gaming experience you have to hear to believe. SUPREME SOUND - Proprietary Supreme Sound technology delivers powerful bass and precision highs. GMX STEREO TRANSMITTER - Lightweight wireless transmitter delivers performance audio for your Xbox 360, PS3 or PC. Customize your mix of game, audio and voice. EQ3 EQUILIZER - MODES Sound equalization settings for games, music and movies. Bass Mode, Supreme Mode, and Precision Mode. PIVOTING BOOM MIC - Adjustable mic position flips up for instant muting. COMPATIBILITY Compatible with Xbox 360, PS3, and PC. DIFINITIVE WIRELESS AUDIO Wireless technology delivers crystal clear audio without tying you down. WARNING: This product contains a chemical known to the State of California to cause birth defects or other reproductive harm
feature_bullets: SUPREME SOUND - Proprietary Supreme Sound technology delivers powerful bass and precision highs
DEFINITIVE WIRELESS AUDIO - Wireless technology delivers crystal clear stereo audio without tying you down
PIVOTING BOOM MIC - Adjustable mic position flips up for instant muting
EQ3 EQUALIZER MODES - Sound equalization settings for games, music, and movies
COMPATIBILITY - Compatible with Xbox 360, PS3, and PC as well as most mobile phones, tablets and MP3 players
